scripts.test: npm run test:lint && npm run test:cms && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:lint: cd cms && npm run lint && cd ../web && npm run lint
scripts.init: cd e2e && npm ci && cd ../cms && npm ci && cd ../web && npm ci
scripts.build:cms: docker-compose build cms cms-test; docker-compose -f docker-compose-ci.yml build cms-ci
scripts.build:web: docker-compose build web web-test; docker-compose -f docker-compose-ci.yml build web-ci
scripts.typeorm: docker exec -ti reclab-cms-test npx ts-node node_modules/typeorm/cli.js
scripts.migrations:generate: curl http://localhost:3003/seeder/clear && npm run migrations:run && npm run typeorm -- migration:generate -d migrations -n
scripts.rebuild: npm stop && docker image rm reclab_web && npm run build && npm start
scripts.rebuild:cms: npm stop && npm run build:cms && npm start
scripts.rebuild:web: npm run stop:web && docker image rm reclab_web reclab_web-test && npm run build:web && npm start
